name: Bureaucrats
description:
A storyworld where you compete with the other job applicants to get hired.

This is a very early version. It still needs art & sound and polish. If people like it then I'll flesh it out, and even make more games of the genre.

This is meant to be played multiple times. Each time you learn about how to better interact with the characters to get to the top and win.

I would really appreciate some feedback.
